Item 1: You are watching the twenty-third Purple Awards for Excellence in Television. In the next few minutes, we will be announcing the best news show, best drama series, and best TV documentary. As this show is being televised, we would like to remind our audience to hold the applause until all the awards have been announced.

This morning, I’m going to discuss an interesting housing trend. Because you’re in the real estate business, you know that fifteen years ago, people were thinking big when it came to buying homes. Now, however, smaller homes are becoming more popular. They are cheaper to buy, easier to maintain, and more economical to heat and cool.
Item 3: Imagine that you are talking on the telephone with a friend from another country who is visiting your town. You are talking about shops in your area.Question 5: What hours are shops generally open in your area?Question 6: What’s a good place to shop for gifts in your area, and is it easy to get there?Question 7: Which of the following do you think I should buy for my family as a souvenir?Coffee mugsFridge magnetsCosmetics

Item 4.text: Question 8: Where is your flower shop, and what time do you open?Question 9: I think my boss said he already made a payment. Is that right?Question 10: I don’t know how many flowers he ordered. Can you tell me all the details of his order?

Item 5: Express an opinion Which of the following do you think is the best way to get news? Why?Using the InternetWatching the news on televisionReading a newspaperUse specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
